attributes.action: Stop the under 16s social media ban
attributes.additional_details: By the age of 13 children are responsible and know what to look out for on social media
attributes.background: Change the age from under 16 years old to under 13 years old

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Do not ban social media for under 16s" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/757233
